A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Disney and Rian Johnson has did the impossible.  

I never thought Star Wars franchise can be killed in one movie.

1.  Luke's character was completely destroyed in this film.  No longer a beacon of hope in the original Star Wars.  Instead we see a insane insecure borderline wimp.  

2.  Kylo REN continues his child anger management issue.  As main villain has lacks depth and sophistication.  

So many plot holes\, lacks flow.  There isn't even one character in the movie that draws you in.

This is the worst Star Wars ever made.  It's not even a good film let alone a Star Wars film.

First time after film ends-  no one single clap.  Force awakens was such a great film.  The last Jedi makes justice league look like an Oscar winner.
